traffic lights.description: A set of traffic lights ahead has turned red.
traffic lights.explanation: A red light indicates that the vehicle must stop and wait for the signal to change before continuing to drive.

barriers.description: Large portable yellow barriers have been placed on the right side of the road.
barriers.explanation: This requires that self-driving vehicles follow the new traffic flow, which may involve merging into the left lane and being mindful of any oncoming traffic that might be affected by the same obstacle.

other objects.description: The streetlights and vegetation by the roadside.
other objects.explanation: These do not directly affect driving behavior, but attention should be paid to maintain lane discipline.

other objects.description: There is a large yellow trash can on the side of the road occupying part of the bike lane.
other objects.explanation: These objects may obstruct the bike lane, or cause cyclists to merge into the driving lane, therefore the vehicle must be vigilant for vulnerable road users who may accidentally enter the traffic lane.

general_perception.description and explanation:
The image reveals several key road elements. A set of traffic lights ahead has turned red, requiring the vehicle to stop and wait for the signal to change before proceeding. On the right side of the road, large portable yellow barriers have been placed, necessitating that the self-driving vehicle follow an adjusted traffic flow which may involve merging into the left lane and being cautious of any oncoming traffic also navigating around the barrier.

Additionally, there are streetlights and vegetation by the roadside. While these do not directly impact driving behavior, they require the vehicle to maintain lane discipline. Moreover, a large yellow trash can is situated on the side of the road, occupying part of the bike lane. This could force cyclists to merge into the driving lane, prompting the vehicle to be vigilant for vulnerable road users who may inadvertently enter its path.

driving_suggestion: Drive cautiously and slow down as needed when approaching traffic ahead. Prepare to merge left, heeding warning signs and obstacles, to accommodate potential lane closures or detours. Stay alert when nearing obstacles, mindful of any additional changes in traffic patterns and the responses of other road users. Upon encountering a red light, the vehicle must come to a complete stop at the designated point and wait until the green light to proceed. Exercise caution when passing obstacles and trash bins on the right, watching for any potential hazards or road users that may affect the drivable path.

1.description and explanation: A large yellow dustbin positioned on the side of the road. As an obstacle near the driving path, the presence of the dustbin requires the ego car to maintain a safe distance and possibly adjust its position within the lane to avoid any potential for collision. The ego car should monitor the area around the bin for any unexpected movements or obstructions, such as waste falling out or being tossed into the bin which might enter the driving path.
